name: Goldscale
description:
A little story in game format about a mage and a sea monster! 💖

CONTROLS:

WASD or ARROWS move the character and interact with the dialogue.

RIGHT ARROW or D progress the cutscenes. You have to press these to go through the cutscenes!

Thank you for playing!! ❤️ ; 7;

Description & Thoughts

I made this small Bitsy game for Mini Jam 108! I spent about 24 hours on it or so. I wish I could've started on it sooner, but alas... I didn't. If I had started on it sooner, I might have been able to make music for it! For now, though, it's pretty quiet. I think I'm gonna add music for it in the future!

My game idea didn't have combat so the limitation kinda put some pressure on me, but I tried to incorporate the theme and limitation in the story, at least!

This was really fun! I really wish I could have made music for this. Anyway, I hope someone enjoys it!! If you find any bug, let me know!

To make this game I used Bitsy, Pixsy and Borksy, and also the following Bitsy hacks: "Basic SFX" and "Transparent Sprites", both by Sean S. LeBlanc, and "Favicom-From-Sprite" by Mildmojo! 

I also used Krita for most of the art and JFXR for the sound effect!! ✨; 7;

Art, writing and sound design (as little of it as there is) by me!! ❤️ I had a lot of fun attempting more pixel art in this! I have to improve a lot but it was fun! Bitsy's restrictive 3-color palette made this a big challenge and I love it! ;  7;
